enhanced_by.reason: The split method relies on the getPairs method to prepare the pairs of lists that will be evaluated for splitting.
The split method sorts the items using the comparator method, which is crucial for determining the order of items before splitting.
The split method uses the marginValueSum method to evaluate the sum of margin values, which is a key factor in determining the best split.
The split method uses the overlap method to calculate the overlap between pairs, which is a critical factor in the splitting decision.
